ext_descriptions.ext_description: An approval_item type is an extensible list of alternate entity data types. It provides a mechanism to refer to instances of the data types included in the types that extend the approval_item type. This empty extensible select type requires extension in a further module, to ensure that any entity data type that refers to it can have a valid instantiation.
An Approval is a confirmation of the quality of activity or product data.
The point in time when the Approval is or was supposed to be performed. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
The point in time when the Approval actually became valid. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
The Approval_status that provides a user interpretable designation of the level of approval.
The set of instances of Approving_person_and_organization that identify the organizations or persons in organization that have granted the approval. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A text that completes the information provided within the status attribute, specifying the reason or goal of the Approval. 'released for production' or 'preliminary design completed' are of approval purposes.
An Approval_assignment is the assignment of an Approval to activity or product data.
The Approval that is assigned with activity or product data.
The activity or product data to which the Approval is assigned.
An Approval_relationship is a typed association between two instances of Approval.
A text that provides further information about the Approval_relationship. The value of this attibute need not be specified.
One of the Approval objects that is a part of the relationship.
The other of the Approval objects that is a part of the relationship. If one element of the relationship is dependent of the other, this attribute shall be the dependent one.
An Approval_status is a particular rank of approval.
The text by which the Approval_status is designated. 'approved' and 'disapproved' are examples of Approval_status.
An Approving_person_organization is an association between an Approval and the organization or person and organization that has granted this approval.
the Organization or the Person_in_organization that has granted the approval.
The point in time when the Approval has been given. This attribute need not be specified.
